Title: Mens Accurist gold plated bracelet watch MB985W
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Mens Accurist gold plated bracelet watch MB985W RRP £80.00 Now £55.00 Description This mens Accurist watch has a chunky gold plated design and a large round cream dial. Gold coloured batons and numbers mark the hours and the day and date window is at three. This Accurist watch is 50m water resistant too. Comes in the official Accurist watch packaging and with a 2 year manufacturer's warranty. Chapelle reference: 08120382 Other Brands we stock About Chapelle Chapelle Jewellery is a family run business offering jewellery and watches with discounts of up to 50% off RRP. We purchase at the best possible prices and pass on these savings to our customers. All our items are new and perfect goods; we do not sell seconds or second-hand items. We are authorised stockists of all the brands we sell so you can be confident you're buying from a reputable company. Delivery Orders dispatched within the UK will be sent using Royal Mail Recorded Signed For first class. Orders being sent to international destinations will be sent by Royal Mail International Signed For delivery. Visit our ebay store for our full range >>
